column10: Reason for Request
Powerwash pavers at clubhouse entrance including circular drive and breezeway entrance from parking lot.
Light out in gym over free weight area
Sprinkler head broken by the driveway and sidewalk near the mailbox.

The motion detector light above the entrance to the A&C Studio does not function. It is always dark there. I can depress the button, it goes on, but the next time someone wals there, it remains dark. Please fix, replace, or replace with a regular switch that will stay on. Thank you.

The West pedestrian gate at the Oak Vista gate is broken and has been for a while. Anyone can come and go as the gate does not close at all. 
Also, since Sunday (01/26), Monday and today, I’ve seen unauthorized vehicles come through the vehicle gate at the Oak Vista Gate. 
I’ve seen Walmart trucks just pull up to the gate and it just opens. Other commercial vehicles as well. 
I think the reader is not properly processing vehicles properly.

Sprinkler heads by corner hedges are better but still 2 not getting any water spread caught in hedges-all heads are flooding therefore theres along whole side of neighbors house and grass outside my fence not getting any water and dead. Please come check out again. Thanks

The Valley Gutter in front of my house is stained and it was not like this prior to Clean and Green doing the regular lawn service on Monday December 1.  In addition, the bottom of the driveway has similar stains.  None of this was present prior to the service provided by C&G last Monday.

The AE wall between the Whitworth Shopping Center and the back of homes on New Holland Way at the south end of the community, has soil erosion under the wall and there are spaces allowing easy access to AE for rodents and feral cats. Please fill in to close up theses areas with discarded Har-Tru.

Thanks you.
When the tree work was recently done, the equipment they used at the end of my driveway was too heavy and left it somewhat depressed.

Our roof is very dirty with black mold evident. Most roofs in our neighborhood are mostly clean and do not have the dirty appearance that our does. The roof cleaning company that was hired by the HOA was observed pulling their hoses between our north side neighbor’s house and ours on September 9, 2024, late in the day. However the cleaning of our roof was not observed that day or subsequently. Given the current condition of the roof less than 16 months later, I suspect that our roof was not cleaned at that time. Consequently, I ask that the HOA to reach out to the roof cleaning company and seek a resolution. Thank you.
Please would you arrange to have the unsightly/unhealthy bird droppings pressure cleaned from pickleball court #2. This situation is also embarrassing when hosting visiting teams. Thank you.

On the littoral shelf behind our house, new plants were planted.

They are all dead.

See attached.

When the sprinklers have finished, I notice a pattern of silt on the sidewalk in front of one of the sprinkler heads.  I haven't seen them working since they are operational early morning.  I think one of the sprinkler heads is not popping up, and undermining the soil.

In the kitchen, there is a drawer whose front comes almost off when one opens it. If you are entering from the ballroom, walk straight ahead, it is the one one the right.
Thanks.

concrete on sidewalk at the foot of the driveway is cracked and lifted and is causing a tripping hazard.
Please inspect and arrange to have it fixed ASAP
Thank you
Eileen Rosen
elevin48@gmail.com
856-465-3596

Sometimes after extended machine downtime (overnight) the middle treadmill does not turn on when the buttons are pressed. You have to turn off and then turn on the rocker (power) switch on the lower front of the machine. After that reset the buttons will once again function.

The uneven surface under the artificial turf in directly in front of the pickleball court bleachers represents a potential trip hazard, and the risk of litigation in the event of an injury attributable to this situation. The artificial surface needs to be uplifted, and the offending area smoothed out using Har-Tru, or similar material to provide a smooth/flattened surface.
Sprinkler head isn’t working properly is flushing surrounding soil on to the sidewalk. Location is east of 7876 Lando Avenue in large open area between the houses.

The sprinkler head in my front hedge row is broken. Water gushing out.
Located by the front window on the left side.
Thank You,
 Anthony Bocchini
The tires under the seesaw on the tot lot are disintegrating and coming apart in small pieces
we have several pavers that are lifting.  The roots are coming from the tree at curbside tree (community tree) causing a trip hazard.
Please clean rusted areas from fountains.  Treat with rust inhibitor and repaint as needed.

Request for trap & removal of a very large raccoon from around the pond #6 area.  The animal resides along the bushes that are against the wall bordering the alley area of Whitworth Farms that extends to Landrum and the back gate. (behind 7664 New Holland Way).
Ant hills on driveway apron and sidewalk cracks - entire length of sidewalk and onto adjacent lot

Please have someone remove concrete square laying on ground on berm of a few months now. Also, there is a missing piece of cement on the top post of the cement wall that needs repair. Been like this since tree was removed months ago. Have Clean & Green blow all dead tree trimmings on ground of berm after every mowing is done, after they blow off grass trimmings. It’s a mess back there.

Front of home has a missing head. We are unsure if water is getting to this area. Clean and Green will re-inspect this area on Friday 2.6.26 to ensure all areas are getting coverage in the front and determine if the missing head needs to be replaced or capped.

The grass area between 7567 Monticello and 7559 Monticello is flooded after sprinklers run.   Can the sprinkler within the lawn area be check?   It's possible the sprinkler head popped and the water is gushing out??
Thanks

The nut tree in my backyard needs to be trimmed.  The branches hang over the house.  I just replace the roof and I fear the nuts will drop and crack the tiles.  Also, the lower branches have small limbs growing with nuts as well.  These new small branches were always cut off n the past.  Can you please cut them off now.
I checked out the median on Hagen Ranch Road. It has weeds, and many sapplings that need to be removed BEFORE it is mulched. Please instruct C&G to do so. Thanks.

Around the ping pong table, the wind screen needs to be reattached to the fence in several spaces. Looks messy.

Thank you.

Second request please cut these two bushes to 6 feet tall each.
Also the tree in the front is blocking our walkway
The heart rate monitor on the treadmill closest to the window is not working. If you grab the handles the heart rate display never rurns on.
Camera for Main Pool is not working.  Please contact SS&M.
Clean & Green just planted two new Bushes on the burm behind my house (work order ZF24286).   They are dying or dead (see attached pictures).

Broken sprinkler head on the southeast corner of Oakvista Dr and Monticello Way.  See attached photo

There is another broken sprinkler head at the main entrance immediately inside the resident entrance gates on the north side of Avalon Pkwy.  I do not have a photo of that one.

"Aftermath of tree removal". Stones on berm from tree removal need to be washed from mud from saw dust. Mulch needed under new shrubs. Big slab of concrete needs to be replaced on wall. Steve needs to inspect this lousy job.
Grass to be added to the bare spot near new tree which was recently planted in front of home.

Oak tree was removed in front of home but roots remain sending dozens of offshoots in my apron (pavers) and by my mailbox
Sod was installed but mailbox is elevated and is too high.

Please check all sprinkler heads . The front one on the east side is missing and a couple of the others are not totally spraying the areas.

Thank you

The water usage for the tennis building has been higher than normal. It usually runs 5,000 gallons per month.  In January it was 30,000 gallons, February was 14,000 gallons,  March was 5,000  but April was 15,000 gallons.  Please check for running toilets and faucets in all the bathrooms.

To date Clean and Green has not serviced the rear of my property for tree trimming. 
I have a coconut palm that needs trimming and coconuts removed.
Also, I have several tree branches that need to be trimmed.
Now that the pool fence border is removed we should power wash the fence to determine if it’s needs painting

Sod replacement planned  after  removal  trees..   Front lawn, swale, and
between houses,( Eastside). Also at the rear ,(north end.).. Sprinkler testing? and marking please.
Numerous pavers are sticking up in the driveway.

Homeowner has photos of broken Agave Plant and his garden art sculpture was crushed. 
Plants have been hacked and cut very poorly.
Homeowner is requesting that a supervisor please meet with him. 561-901-5724

broken irrigation pipe again likely
had water in propane tank before past pipe found. Was dry but checked today and water is there again.
 Please find leak ASAP
Kindly make repairs to the irrigation pipe that has been ruptured due to tree root behind home at 7608 New Holland Way (Larry Fleming). Thank you.
